name: react-zeroconfig-payments
description: React payment components that require zero configuration.
author: Tom SÃ¶derlund <tom@tomsoderlund.com>

scripts.new: touch src/components/New.js; touch src/components/New.css; touch stories/New.stories.js; echo ADD NEW COMPONENT HERE >> src/components/index.js; echo Created component New.js, to rename do:; echo mv src/components/New.js src/components/MyComponent.js; echo mv src/components/New.css src/components/MyComponent.css; echo mv stories/New.stories.js stories/MyComponent.stories.js; echo ALSO update index.js
scripts.test:
echo 'Running Standard.js and Jasmine unit tests...
' && yarn lint && yarn unit
scripts.prepare: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && babel ./src/components -d dist --copy-files
